page.title: 03GOWY VALLEY LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: {LISTED BUILDINGS}GUILDEN SUTTON_St. Johns Church & Sundial,Hill Farm House LITTLETON_Littleton Old Hall (farm). GREAT BARROW_St. Bartholomews Church, Old Rectory,Mill House,Lower House,The Cottage,Bridgewater House,White House, Barrow Hall Farm,Amari House,New House Farm.{PLACE NAMES}Guilden (golden)_ rich nature of land or profusion of marigold found on watermeadows.Sutton_ Anglo Saxon"Sudtone"Southern homestead Littleton_small farm.Great Barrow Old English"bearu"woods or "beorg"hill or mound.{FARM NAMES}The Byatts "biat" to begat.Holme meadow (Guilden Sutton)old strip system boundaries still visible. Town field known as the Tamfy,once common land.{LANGUAGE}Spoken dialect not easily detected, words survive eg Pikel-pitchfork,scriking-crying,eshen- milkcan,ess-ash and quillet-strips of land are but a few.
